original_title: Zurück zu Stalin : Die Angst der Sieger vor der Heimkehr
overview: Based on the testimonies of 4 survivors, a powerful documentary on the treatment inflicted on Soviet war prisoners, suspected of betrayal by the Stalinist regime. An exceptional word that pays homage to hundred of thousands of forgotten victims.
title: Zurück zu Stalin : Die Angst der Sieger vor der Heimkehr
